messageBody:
It was! The only thing missing in the FAQ is making it clear that the
classpath should be the parent of junit/runner/excluded.properties and not
the parent of excluded.properties itself.
Cheers

Subject: RE: [junit] RE: File - JUnit FAQ.txt


Hi,

I wrote the new answers to that FAQ. Except perhaps in unusual static
initializer cases, the excluded.properties has nothing to do with
NoClassDefFoundErrors or ClassNotFoundExceptions, which is why that FAQ
is now about ClassCastExceptions and LinkageErrors.

If you're getting NoClassDef/ClassNotFound problems, it's most likely a
plain old classpath problem.

Scott Stirling
